name: Gallery Space Rental
description: Short-term exhibit space for local artists to showcase and sell their work under guild auspices.

name: Guild-Backed Auctions
description: Public or private auctions conducted under strict guild oversight to ensure fairness and legality.

name: Secure Holding Accounts
description: Clients may deposit coin or valuables for short- or long-term safekeeping, guaranteed by the guild.

name: Etiquette Consultation
description: Social coaching and training in noble etiquette, fashion, and courtly behavior.

name: Troupe Booking Service
description: Connect with a licensed performance troupe for festivals, private functions, or public events.

name: Discreet Inquiry
description: Hire a broker to quietly gather information about a person, group, or topic of interest.

name: Market Stall Permit
description: Official license to operate a stall in a guild-sanctioned marketplace.

name: Foundling Archives
description: Historical records and genealogical services available to find lost bloodlines or track ancestry.
price: 10 gp per document, 50+ gp for full research
